<MethodEndpoint

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Reassigns drafts/templates to the selected email.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"folder":{"description":"Folder ID","type":"integer"},"email":{"description":"Email to which messages will be reassigned","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
